title: Logistics Convoy Resource Planning
description: A planner must select the right number and type of vehicles for a supply convoy, including gun trucks for security.

tasks.description: Determine the total volume and weight of cargo that needs to be transported.
tasks.expected_outcome: Planner accurately calculates the total logistics requirement.

tasks.description: Analyze the threat level along the planned route to determine the required level of security.
tasks.expected_outcome: Planner assesses the threat and determines a specific number of gun trucks are needed.

tasks.description: Select the optimal mix of cargo trucks and gun trucks from the motor pool to meet the mission requirements efficiently.
tasks.expected_outcome: Planner creates a convoy composition that is both effective and efficient.
